DOC.criteria: Healthy Subject Cohorts : Healthy male female subject Age 18 50 Years ( inclusive ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19.0 31.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Type 2 Diabetic Subject Cohorts : Male female Type 2 diabetic subject currently treat stable dose metformin Age 18 65 Years ( inclusive ) BMI 25.0 40.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Have glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) > 7.0 % â‰¤9.5 % Have fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) < 240 mg/dL Healthy Subject Cohorts : Known clinically relevant history presence significant respiratory , gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , hematological , lymphatic , neurological , cardiovascular , psychiatric , musculoskeletal , genitourinary , immunological , metabolic dermatological connective tissue disease Subjects systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg Type 2 Diabetic Subject Cohorts : Subjects know medical history presence type 1 diabetes mellitus Subjects know medical history acute metabolic diabetic complication Subjects uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg
